plot: Judy Cheasler is a woman struggling with her addiction to cigarettes. In a move of desperation, she visits a hypnotist. The resulting cure has consequences that are both strange and unforeseen.
title: Remember This
plot_es: Judy Cheasler is a woman struggling with her addiction to cigarettes. In a move of desperation, she visits a hypnotist. The resulting cure has consequences that are both strange and unforeseen.
